bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with da pu shang sun 打撲傷損 . Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry da dou chi 大豆豉 quoting Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 25: 治被毆擊損傷聚血，腹滿煩惱悶方 , “Recipe for injuries from an assault with blood collecting, and also a feeling of fullness in the abdomen, vexation and annoyance as well as heart-pressure”, writes: 毆傷瘀聚，腹 中悶滿 , “ Injuries from a blow , with collection of stagnant [blood], and in the abdomen a feeling of heart-pressure and fullness”.
